metadata.description: Relationship 'facility' and all reports and report views.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The block where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The district where this facility is.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The division where this facility is.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The contact information for this facility.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The facility type for this facility.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The state where this facility is located.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The division where this facility is for limits.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of filled positions in this facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `hippo_position` WHERE facility = `primary_form+id` and status = 'position_status|closed')

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The number of open positions at this facility.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `hippo_position` WHERE facility = `primary_form+id` and status = 'position_status|open')

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: Total Number of Government Health Facilities in Bihar.
